articles.title: IND vs SA, 2nd T20I: Mullanpur Pitch Report, Maharaja Yadavindra Singh International Stadium Stats and Records
articles.description: India will take on South Africa in the second T20I on December 11. The clash will take place at Maharaja Yadavindra Singh International Cricket Stadium in Mullanpur.
articles.content: The 2nd T20I between India and South Africa is set to take place at the brand new Maharaja Yadavindra Singh International Cricket Stadium in Mullanpur, New Chandigarh. Following a decisive victory in the series opener, India carry a 1-0 lead and stro... [2312 chars]

articles.description: With the IPL 2026 mini auction just days away, the Board of Control for Cricket in India (BCCI) unveiled the complete roster of players set to go under the hammer on December 16 in Abu Dhabi.
